name: Black Works Studio - Killer Bee Green Hornet - Corona Larga
brand: Black Works Studio, Killer Bee Green Hornet
additionalNotes: Killer Bee uniqueness of having natural wrapper striped around the cap, the Green Hornet uses Candela tobacco strips wrapped around a dark, delicious Ecuadorian Maduro wrapper to create the same look. To enhance the cigar, Brown also included a Candela wrapper around the foot of the cigar. Inside lays a combination of Nicaraguan Habano binder and Nicaraguan fillers that complete the full-bodied profile. Your palate will become ignited by a rich natural sweetness enhanced with notes of earth, leather, dark cocoa, espresso bean, grass and black pepper that remain prominent throughout the entire burn.
